Posts.Content: I-am-Woman-Hear-Me-Roar wrote: I had my drains removed the other day, but the swelling under my arms seems to be getting worse, feel like a muscle man who can't put their arms down straight to their body.  Is there anything I can do to relieve this?  Its a weekend and my doctor's office is closed. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: After Drains - Still lots of swelling I-am-Woman-Hear-Me-Roar kiwifriend
